title: Elon Musk Donates to GOP Lawmakers Targeting Judicial Oversight
summary: Elon Musk donated maximum campaign contributions of $6,600 to at least seven Republican lawmakers who have publicly called for impeaching or limiting the power of federal judges blocking his government efficiency initiatives. Recipients included Representatives Eli Crane, Lauren Boebert, Andy Ogles, Andrew Clyde, Derrick Van Orden, Brandon Gill, and Senator Chuck Grassley.

sources.title: Elon Musk Donates to GOP Lawmakers After They Back His Calls to Impeach Judges

notes: Musk donated to lawmakers challenging judicial rulings blocking his government efficiency initiatives.
